backend/main.mo: Defines data types for residents, medications, vitals, ADL, MAR, and related healthcare records within the backend actor.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items mapping features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files to aid in build planning and documentation.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v46.md: Deployment guide detailing steps, checks, and troubleshooting for rolling back the app to version 46.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting version metadata, favicon assets, and loading the main frontend bundle.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining app name, icons, and display properties for installation.
frontend/public/version.txt: Version marker file containing the value 46.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's router, query client configuration, and wraps everything in ProtectedGate and QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication gate that handles login flow and then wraps content with backend reachability and profile bootstrap gates.
Renders the brand logo with multiple fallback URL variants and displays initials if all image loads fail.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, content outlet, footer, and sign‑out handling.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Renders the primary navigation bar with active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Modal form for creating a new resident, managing nested fields and validation.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/a: Modal form for creating a new ADL record with fields for date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
Displays a list of ADL records with sorting, formatting, and deletion capabilities.
Re-exports the ADL dialog and history list components.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog for editing resident information with dynamic physician and responsible-person lists.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/m: Modal form for adding a MAR record by selecting an active medication and recording administration details.
Re-exports the MAR dialog and history list components.
Displays sorted MAR history entries with date/time formatting and delete support.
Dialog for adding a new medication with fields for name, dosage, route, times, prescriber, and notes.
Dialog component for editing a medication, handling form state, validation, and saving updated medication data.
Re-exports medication-related components for easier module imports.
Displays a medication’s details with status, route, times, physician, and action buttons.
Physician selection input supporting unassigned and specialty display, with fallback UI when no physicians exist.
Select input for medication administration route, including support for custom 'other' routes.
Row action controls for editing, discontinuing, resuming, and deleting medications with confirmation dialogs.
Renders a list of medications and provides an interface to add, edit, or manage their status.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Shows a resident summary card with actions to view, delete, or toggle status.
Header section for the residents dashboard with an add-resident button.
Provides room-based filtering and sorting controls for the resident list.
Displays residents in a responsive grid or shows an empty-state message.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Provides a tab UI for filtering residents by All, Active, or Discharged status.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/v: Dialog for recording daily vitals with form inputs, validation, temperature conversion, and submission logic.
Displays and manages a resident’s vitals history, including sorting, formatting, and deleting entries with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: Shows a placeholder card listing missing reference materials and links to the full checklist.
frontend/src/components/startup/BackendR: Gates app rendering until the backend is confirmed reachable, showing loading or error states with retry.
frontend/src/components/startup/ProfileB: Ensures the user profile is loaded or created before rendering children, handling loading and failure states.
frontend/src/hooks/residentQueryKeys.ts: Provides centralized factory functions for resident-related React Query keys scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Reports when the backend actor and identity are fully initialized and ready for dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthCheck.ts: Performs a timed backend health check using an anonymous actor and exposes reachability status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and provides identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, residents directory with fallbacks, and mutations for CRUD operations using an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, and print-specific styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/brand.ts: Exports branding constants including app name and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/medicationRoutes.ts: Defines medication route options and utilities to convert between UI values, backend types, and display labels.
frontend/src/lib/medications.ts: Utility functions for updating, deleting, filtering, and generating IDs for medication records.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the residents dashboard with filters, sorting, KPIs, health checks, and directory interactions.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Defines a Medication type and provides mock medication lists based on resident ID.
Defines resident profile data structures and returns fallback mock profile data.
Provides a mock list of residents with basic info like age, room, and medication counts.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Utility functions to calculate and format a resident's age from a birthdate.
Transforms backend resident data into simplified view models with formatted age and room display.
Functions for filtering, sorting, and computing KPIs on resident view models.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Renders a resident profile view with tabs, backend data loading, medication management, vitals, MAR, ADL dialogs, and print options.
React component that renders a printable resident profile report including demographics, insurance, and medications.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: UI page outlining required reference materials and screenshots for recreating the app design.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and documents backend initialization race issues along with related existing feature requirements.
